channel.title: Comments on: Yellow Bleeders at Logon

item.title: By: Ben Poole
item.dc:creator: Ben Poole
item.description: <p>Alan already knows this, but in case anyone is Googling, to add Sametime groups in Adium, whilst logged-in to your ST account, go to the File menu, highlight your account (it will be an option saying something like "Disconnect <USER_NAME>"), and in the sub-menu that appears, select "Add Notes Address Book Group…"</p>
item.content:encoded: Alan already knows this, but in case anyone is Googling, to add Sametime groups in Adium, whilst logged-in to your ST account, go to the File menu, highlight your account (it will be an option saying something like “Disconnect <USER_NAME>”), and in the sub-menu that appears, select “Add Notes Address Book Group…”

item.title: By: Alan Lepofsky
item.dc:creator: Alan Lepofsky
item.description: <p>Is there a way to add the BleedYellow group via Adium?</p>
item.content:encoded: Is there a way to add the BleedYellow group via Adium?

item.title: By: Matt White
item.dc:creator: Matt White
item.description: <p>Actually there were milliseconds before, I just wasn't quick enough on the screenshot <img alt="Emoticon" src="<a rel="nofollow ugc">http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5MZVLY/$File/smile.gif"</a> /> Anyway, thanks to Lotus911 for the service.</p>
item.content:encoded: Actually there were milliseconds before, I just wasn’t quick enough on the screenshot http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5MZVLY/$File/smile.gif“ /> Anyway, thanks to Lotus911 for the service.

item.title: By: Nathan T. Freeman
item.dc:creator: Nathan T. Freeman
item.description: <p>So Matt.... should I take away anything from the fact that there's not a single 911'er on your list? <img alt="Emoticon" src="<a rel="nofollow ugc">http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5MZVLS/$File/biggrin.gif"</a> /><br /><br />Thanks for the nod. I think the same thing everytime I look at that buddy list, honestly.</p>
item.content:encoded:
So Matt…. should I take away anything from the fact that there’s not a single 911’er on your list? http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5MZVLS/$File/biggrin.gif“ />

Thanks for the nod. I think the same thing everytime I look at that buddy list, honestly.
